restaurant.name: Tamra - Shangri-La's - Eros Hotel
restaurant.cuisines: North Indian, Continental, European, Chinese, Thai

location.address: Shangri-La's Eros Hotel, 19, Ashoka Road, Janpath, New Delhi
location.locality_verbose: Shangri La's - Eros hotel, Janpath, New Delhi

event.description:
The dawn of Easter Sunday with its message of new life is a high point in the Christian calendar. Easter is meant to be a symbol of hope, renewal and new life.
 
On Sunday, 16 April, 2017, guests can enjoy an Easter themed indulgent Sunday Brunch painstakingly curated by our culinary masters at Tamra. Patrons are invited to celebrate this season of new beginnings with Tamra’s Easter Sunday Brunch. Blending tradition with world flavours in a magical setting, young patrons will find an array of fun activities that come with Easter goodies and a complimentary access to the pool.
Featuring an organic egg counter for live cooking, live grills, a kid’s buffet, classic Easter puddings and an interactive dessert counter, Tamra is the perfect place to treat yourselves and your loved ones!

INR 3950 plus taxes - Champagne Brunch
INR 3000 plus taxes - Cocktail Brunch
INR 2300 plus taxes - Soft beverage Brunch
INR 1500 plus taxes - Kids Brunch
event.title: Easter Sunday at Shangri- La's
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
